A5_DEFINE_GLOBAL_VARS Function C a5_define_global_vars() Brings up a dialog box to define Global Variables
The A5_DEFINE_GLOBAL_VARS() function displays the Global Variables dialog box, which allows you to edit, add, or delete global variables. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
a5_define_global_vars()
a5_define_global_vars()
